Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz scored the only goal of the match on 7 minutes.
Romelu Lukaku had two goals disallowed by VAR - once for offside and once for a handball in the build-up.
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco refuses to criticise officials after Belgium's loss to Slovakia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Euro 2024.
